輫字的基本解释

輫
pái
车箱。

輫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pái］
［《廣韻》步皆切，平皆，並。］
车箱，车中用来载人或装物的部分。

輫字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輫； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1245第21
【廣韻】【集韻】?步皆切，音排。【玉篇】車箱也。【集韻】車箱，楚衞之閒謂之輫。　又【廣韻】薄廻切【集韻】蒲枚切，?音裴。義同。

輫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
輫字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Reel
pái
Carriage.
Reel
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pái］
["Guangyun" all steps are cut, all flat, combined. ]
Car box, the part of the car used to carry people or stuff.
Reel
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輫; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1245 and 21
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] All steps are cut, sound arrangement. [Jade articles] The carriage is also. [Jiyun] The car box, the leisure of Chu and Wei is called reeling.　[Guang Yun] Bo Ye cut [Ji Yun] Pu Mei cut,? Yin Pei. The same meaning.
